semantic_title: Pressure-Induced Deep Tissue Damage Coding Guidelines
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 12. Chapter 12: Diseases of the Skin and Subcutaneous Tissue > a. Pressure ulcer stage codes > 7) Pressure-induced deep tissue damage

content.full_text: For pressure-induced deep tissue damage or deep tissue pressure injury, assign only the appropriate code for pressure-induced deep tissue damage (L89.--6). (Evidence: pg no: 60, L56-L58)
content.summary: Specific coding guideline for pressure-induced deep tissue damage using only the L89.--6 code designation (Evidence: pg no: 60, L56-L58)

Single code assignment (Evidence: pg no: 60, L56, L58)

detailed_rules.explanation: For pressure-induced deep tissue damage or deep tissue pressure injury, use only the specific deep tissue damage code with the --6 designation (Evidence: pg no: 60, L56-L58)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Identify pressure-induced deep tissue damage
Step 3: Assign appropriate L89.--6 code for site
Step 4: Do not assign additional pressure ulcer codes
